Title: The Brand New Testament
Actors: Pili Groyne, Benoît Poelvoorde, Catherine Deneuve, François Damiens
Plot: God lives in human form as a cynical writer with his young opinionated daughter in present-day Brussels, Belgium. She concludes that her dad is doing a terrible job and decides to rewrite the world, descending to earth in search of her own 6 messengers to write a brand new testament and change the status quo.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 14 wins & 23 nominations.
Production: Orange Studio, Orange Cinéma Séries, Après le Déluge, VOO, RTBF, Climax Films, BeTV, Terra Incognita Films, Juliette Films, BNP Paribas Fortis Film Fund, Caviar Films
